translations.Welcome to the Graasp App Starter Kit: Welcome to the Graasp App Starter Kit

FALLBACK.MESSAGE_TITLE: Sorry, something went wrong with this application
FALLBACK.MESSAGE_FEEDBACK: Our team has been notified. If you would like to help, please, tell us what happened below.

EXCHANGES.TITLE: Exchanges Settings
EXCHANGES.DISABLE_HARD_LIMIT: Do not Allow More Follow Up Questions
EXCHANGES.DEFINE: Please define at least one exchange.

translations.START_INTERACTION: The dialogue lasts about 5 minutes and you'll receive a small reward to thank you for taking part!
